main.name: Jiayu/Jerry Liu
main.description: I am passionate about programming and problem solving, and I am seeking a full-time Software Engineering position starting in summer of 2024.
main.bio: I graduated from Boise State University with Bachelors degree in Computer Science in 2022, and now I am a graduate student in masters of Computer Engineering in New York University, I am passionate about programming and new technologies, I like thinking and solving problems, and try to think of ways of automating different things in life to make life easier.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Here is a list of technologies that I feel confident using with the bar chart showing approximately how much I know, more skills are on the resume:

education.description: Principle of Database Systems, Machine Learning, Computer Architecture, Internet Architecture and Protocol
Data Structures, Programming Languages, Operating Systems, Linear Algebra, Discrete Mathematics

work.title: Software Engineering Intern
work.description: Worked on the frontend, backend and the blockchain part of the Data trading platform MVP.

work.company: Institute for Pervasive Cybersecurity (Boise State University)
work.title: Cybersecurity Analyst Intern
work.description: Looked for data breaches for the local companies in Treasure Valley Idaho on a daily basis.

work.title: Undergraduate Research Technician
work.description: Used machine learning techniques to try to solve and automate the process of identifying the patterns of quantum dots of different materials in the pictures taken by the quantum microscope.

projects.title: Amusement Park E-Ticketing System
projects.category: Created the project in Principles of Database Systems class

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
